#summary Why do we should consider the use of cmake?

== Why? ==
  * Cross-platform build system.
  * [http://www.cmake.org/Wiki/CMake_FAQ#Out-of-source_build_trees Out-of-source_build_trees]
  * [http://www.cmake.org/Wiki/CMake:Packaging_With_CPack CPack] - _make package_
    * [http://www.cmake.org/Wiki/CMake:CPackPackageGenerators CPack_Package_Generators]
      * TGZ, STGZ, TBZ2, TZ, ZIP
      * NSIS (Windows only)
      * RPM, DEV (Unix only)
      * DragNDrop, PackageMaker, OSXX11, Bundle (OSX only) 
  * [http://www.cmake.org/cmake/help/cmake-2.6.html#section_Generators Generators]
    * Borland Makefiles
    * MSYS Makefiles
    * MinGW Makefiles
    * NMake Makefiles
    * Unix Makefiles
    * Visual Studio 6, 7, 8, 9, 10
    * Watcom WMake
    * CodeBlocks - MinGW and Unix Makefiles
    * Eclipse CDT4 - MinGW, NMake and Unix Makefiles
